64.0: This is only a stringency since even though it appears that there is blood in them, in any case it is just fat.
64.5: We are not accustomed to doing this with a fetus: The explanation is that the slaughter of the mother that the fetus was found in permits the fetus and even its sciatic nerve is allowed.

work: Kereti on Shulchan Arukh, Yoreh De'ah
